Your next social gathering or corporate event deserves the very best, which is just what you'll find at the Market Pavilion Hotel. As a venue, we offer a one-of-a-kind, historic Charleston setting. As a top hotel with two world-class restaurants, Grill 225 and the Pavilion Bar, we ensure a pristine experience and the finest cuisine for your guests. . Special Occasions Of course you want your guests to eat, drink and be merry, so host your next special occasion at the Market Pavilion Hotel. Perfect for intimate showers, sophisticated luncheons, cocktail receptions, or lavish weddings, we have the indoor or outdoor venue that's just right for you. Corporate Events Host your next meeting or corporate event with the latest advanced technology and a sense of style at the Market Pavilion Hotel. Want to make it memorable? Let us customize it for you with creative ideas to energize and surprise your guests with all that is bespoke Charleston. Private Event Dining The private and semi-private areas of Market Pavilion Hotel, Grill 225, and the Pavilion atop the Market Pavilion Hotel are the perfect place to celebrate all of life's happy occassions, from an engagement party to an unforgettable 50th anniversary soiree.
